title: Resolve Decision Event
description: Canonical event emitted whenever the resolver issues a decision for a market event.

truth_source.description: Snapshot of the truth source signal considered during resolution.

source.description: Identifier for the upstream truth source.

verdict.description: Outcome suggested by the truth source.

confidence.description: Confidence score reported by the truth source (0â€“1).

observed_at.description: Timestamp when the truth source observation was recorded (ISO 8601).

evidence_uri.description: Optional URI referencing supporting evidence for the truth signal.

notes.description: Additional notes supplied with the truth signal.

ts.description: UTC timestamp when the decision was emitted (ISO 8601).

event_id.description: Identifier of the event/market being resolved.

decision.description: Final decision outcome published by the resolver.

actor.description: Identifier for the actor (service or human) issuing the decision.

role.description: Role assigned to the actor when issuing the decision.

trace_id.description: Trace or decision identifier used for correlation and audit.

reason.description: Machine-readable reason or tag explaining why the decision was reached.

manual_override.description: Whether the decision was produced via manual override.

truth_source_used.description: Indicates if the truth source signal determined the decision.

quorum_ok.description: True when the configured quorum requirement was satisfied.

quorum_votes.description: List of normalized quorum votes considered for the decision.

truth_source.description: Truth source payload captured during evaluation, when available.

evidence_uri.description: Optional URI pointing to supporting evidence reviewed for the decision.

idempotency_key.description: Idempotency key supplied by the caller for deduplication.
